description: Details required by condition 3a (Submission of details-Sample panel) and 3d (Submission of details-new glazed screen between kitchen and stairwell at lower ground floor level) of listed building consent LB/23/03304 (Replacement of non-original rear extension; construction of basement below replacement extension; internal alterations including reinstatement of original features and removal of non-original partitions; replacement of non original secondary glazing on front facade; replacement single glazing with double within existing sash windows on  rear facade; improvement in building's energy performance including roof PV solar panels; replacement of garden structure with an ancillary building; revised landscaping design)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
